description:
Seven Knights - Time Wanderer -  (Free) Wanderer of Time Costume Set (15 Total)
 Claim free costumes for released characters!
 
 <Set Contents>
 - Vanessa's Costume "Descendant of Magic"
 - Hayoung's Costume "Spirit Lamp's Owner"
 - Shane's Costume "Test Subject"
 - Orly's Costume "Realized Potential"
 - Karl Heron's Costume "Daybreak Mercenary"
 - Aquila's Costume "Slayer"
 - Ace's Costume "Young Lord"
 - Kagura's Costume "Chosen One"
 - Lina's Costume "Onmyoji"
 - Teo's Costume "Wind Blade"
 - Rudy's Costume "Guardian"
 - Elysia's Costume "Baron's Daughter"
 - Karma's Costume "Four Lord"
 - Rin's Costume "Emperor's Daughter"
 - Kris's Costume "Dark Rival"
 15 Total
 
 <Warning>
 - You can only purchase the costume set once. (This item is free)
 - You can equip in-game after purchasing.
 - Please claim from "May" in the Room of Sand.
 - Hero portraits don't change.
 - Costumes only change hero appearance - they don't increase stats.
name: (Free) Wanderer of Time Costume Set (15 Total)
